name: Zwe Htet Naing
title: Backend Developer
summary: Motivated backend developer with expertise in building scalable web applications using modern technologies and best practices.
professionalSummary: Motivated and detail-oriented Junior Web Developer with 1 year of hands-on experience in building and maintaining dynamic web applications. Proficient in developing RESTful APIs, integrating third-party services, and ensuring secure backend systems using PHP, Laravel, and MySQL. Skilled in problem-solving, optimizing performance, and collaborating with cross-functional teams to deliver scalable solutions.

responsibilities: Built dynamic websites using Laravel, Livewire, and Alpine.js to create interactive, real-time user experiences.
Developed RESTful APIs to facilitate seamless communication between frontend and backend services, ensuring efficient data handling and enhanced performance.
Implemented best practices for API security, error handling, and validation to improve system reliability.
Collaborated on optimizing API endpoints to reduce response times and improve user experience.
Gained hands-on experience with modern web development frameworks and tools in a production environment.

courses.title: Advanced Web Technology
courses.description: Advanced concepts in modern web development technologies including jQuery, Tailwind CSS, JSON, Firebase, and advanced PHP frameworks.

courses.description: Comprehensive foundation in web technologies including HTML, CSS, JavaScript, Bootstrap, Git, PHP, Laravel, and MySQL database management.

courses.title: Java Standard Edition
courses.description: Strong foundation in Java programming and object-oriented concepts, with practical experience in problem-solving and data structures.
